perturbation.original_text: Each Purchase Order placed under this Agreement shall be exclusively governed by the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Quality Agreement, as amended from time to time, unless specifically otherwise agreed between the Parties in writing. Any terms and conditions of any Purchase Order or acknowledgement given or received which are additional to or inconsistent with this Agreement or the Quality Agreement shall have no effect and such terms and conditions are hereby excluded and rejected.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Sales Order placed under this Agreement shall be exclusively governed by the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Quality Agreement, as amended from time to time, unless specifically otherwise agreed between the Parties in writing. Any terms and conditions of any Sales Order or acknowledgement given or received which are additional to or inconsistent with this Agreement or the Quality Agreement shall have no effect and such terms and conditions are hereby excluded and rejected.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Purchase Order' is replaced with 'Sales Order.' It creates confusion, as itâ€™s unclear whether these two refer to the same document, leading to uncertainty in how orders are placed and governed.

perturbation.original_text: The quantity of Miltenyi Product(s) forecasted for each Calendar Month of the Firm Zone of the most recent rolling Monthly Forecast submitted pursuant to Section 5.1(a) of this Agreement shall be binding on both Parties, commencing on the Effecctive Date of the Agreement (but not for the first three months thereto), and in each Calendar Month during the Term, Bellicum shall have the firm obligation to order at a minimum the amount of Miltenyi Product(s) specified for the first (1st) Calendar Month of the most recent rolling Monthly Forecast (such amount, the "Firm Zone Requirements"). The Firm Zone Requirement shall not apply within the first three months of the Effective Date of the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The quantity of Miltenyi Product(s) projected for each Calendar Month of the Secure Zone of the most recent rolling Monthly Projection submitted pursuant to Section 5.1(a) of this Agreement may be binding on both Parties, commencing on the Effecctive Date of the Agreement (but not for the first three months thereto), and in each Calendar Month during the Term, Bellicum shall have the obligation to consider to order at a minimum the amount of Miltenyi Product(s) specified for the first (1st) Calendar Month of the most recent rolling Monthly Projection (such amount, the "Secure Zone Objectives"). The Secure Zone Objectives shall not apply within the first three months of the Effective Date of the Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Firm Zone' is replaced with 'Secure Zone,' and 'Requirements' with 'Objectives,' changing the nature of the commitment. The original text indicates a binding commitment to purchase a certain quantity of Miltenyi Products, while the modified version implies a non-binding target, creating uncertainty regarding the obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Each quantity of Miltenyi Product(s) ordered by Bellicum in a particular Purchase Order pursuant to this Agreement shall be delivered FCA (Incoterms 2010) Miltenyi's Facility by delivery of the shipped goods to Bellicum's designated carrier or freight forwarder, in adequate packaging and ready for loading, on the Delivery Date ("Delivery").
perturbation.changed_text: Each quantity of Miltenyi Product(s) dispatched by Bellicum in a particular Product Order pursuant to this Agreement shall be delivered FCA (Incoterms 2010) Miltenyi's Factory by delivery of the shipped goods to Bellicum's designated shipping company or express service, in adequate packaging and ready for loading, on the Shipping Date ("Dispatch").
perturbation.explanation: Multiple changes introduce ambiguity: 'ordered' is changed to 'dispatched,' 'Purchase Order' to 'Product Order', 'Facility' to 'Factory', 'carrier or freight forwarder' to 'shipping company or express service,' and 'Delivery Date' to 'Shipping Date.' These changes blur the lines of responsibility.
